title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Schema-Based Language Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary education theory and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design language learning content using schema analysis tools
Learners can diagnose schema development levels based on formative assessment data
Learners can develop one or more language teaching strategy prototypes by applying schema-based instructional design models

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
